parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofpr

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.80

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Multiplayer

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns count of occupied role selection slots for given side. Players who claimed a slot in the lobby but didn't start the mission are counted as well. If <tt>disabledAI <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> 0;</tt> in [[description.ext#disabledAI|description.ext]] or Enable AI option is checked in [[3DEN]], AI bots will be treated as valid players and will be counted too. Multiplayer only, in singleplayer always returns 0.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[playersNumber]] side

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> side: [[Side]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_west = [[playersNumber]] [[west]];
_east = [[playersNumber]] [[east]];
_civ = [[playersNumber]] [[civilian]];
[[hint]] [[format]] ["West:%1 East:%2, Civ:%3", _west, _east, _civ];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[playableSlotsNumber]], [[countSide]], [[allPlayers]], [[allUnits]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">

<dd class="notedate">Posted on April 13, 2015 - 09:44 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:IT07|IT07]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
[[playersNumber]] returns playable AI as well as human players. It does not include non playable AI. [NOTE: This was observed in ArmA 1.05]<br>
To get the amount of players that are on the same side as the person executing the script:
<code>[[playersNumber]] [[playerSide]];</code>

</dl>
